title.en: Saikyou Juzoku Tensei ~Majutsu Otaku no Risoukyou~

altTitles.ja: 最強呪族転生～魔術オタクの理想郷～

altTitles.en: Strongest Curse Clan Reincarnation ~A Magic Geek's Utopia~
Strongest Curse Clan Reincarnation: A Magic User's Utopia

altTitles.ja: 最強呪族転生～チート魔術師のスローライフ～

altTitles.ja-ro: Saikyou Juzoku Tensei ~Cheat Majutsushi no Slow Life~

altTitles.en: Strongest Curse Clan Reincarnation ~The Cheat Magician's Slow Life~

description.en:
I, who should have died after being hit by a car, was born again in another world. However, I was born in a shady minor family that used magic and controlled wooden puppets called the Marren Clan. Possessing a strong interest in magic since my previous life, I spend my time zealously studying magic to the point where even the people in the vicinity draw back. One day, I heard I was to be married to my little sister when I turned 16 in accordance with the traditions of the Marren Clan and decided to flee to the city. For now, since I have the strongest magic, I guess I should idle around making only enough money so that I don’t have to work for my whole life.
___
**Title Note:** When the manga first released, it was under the same title as the light novel, *Strongest Curse Clan Reincarnation ~The Cheat Magician's Slow Life~*. However, by Volume 1's release, the subtitle was changed, making the new full title: *Strongest Curse Clan Reincarnation ~A Magic Geek's Utopia~*.
___
**Character Design:** [Mika Pikazo](https://mangadex.org/author/3dff91ba-165f-4742-b84b-de97a31b1060/mika-pikazo)
description.pt-br: Eu, que deveria ter morrido após ser atropelado, nasci de novo em outro mundo. No entanto, nasci em uma família secundária obscura que usava magia e controlava totems de madeira chamados Clã Marren. Possuindo um forte interesse em magia desde a minha vida anterior, passo meu tempo estudando zelosamente a magia a ponto de até mesmo as pessoas nas proximidades recuarem. Um dia, ouvi dizer que me casaria com minha irmã mais nova quando completasse 16 anos, de acordo com as tradições do Clã Marren, e decidi fugir para a cidade. Por enquanto, como tenho a magia mais forte, acho que deveria ficar ocioso ganhando dinheiro apenas o suficiente para não ter que trabalhar a vida inteira.
description.ru: Мне было суждено умереть в аварии, но я переродился в семье, где использовалась магия — клане Маррен. В своей новой жизни я, как и в старой, обладаю столь сильной тягой к изучению магии, что люди избегают меня. Однажды, узнав о том, что меня решили женить на моей младшей сестре, я сбежал. Туда, где я смогу бездельничать, где заработаю денег на весь остаток жизни!

biography.en:
A Japanese light novel writer who creates gaming fantasy stories. Nekoko began uploading their work on the story publishing website "Become a Novelist" from 2015, and debuted as a commercial writer in 2016 with "Reincarnated as a Dragon Hatchling."

**Name In Native Language:** 猫子

**Other Romanization:** Necoco

**In Other Languages:**
Нэкоко
